## User Information 
REMINDER: the User's GitHub account must have **2FA enabled**. 

Enter the GitHub account values next to each of the following fields:

- GitHub Username: {GITHUB_USERNAME}
- Name: {NAME}
- Role: {ROLE}
- Repository URL: {REPO_URL}
- [ ] Remove Access?
